casebody.data:
OAKLAND PARK, LLC, Woodward Manchester Company, LLC, and Woodward Highland Park, LLC, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
CITY OF DETROIT, Great Lakes Water Authority, and Detroit Water and Sewerage Department, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 159036
COA: 339610 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 2, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the December 18, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
